extension.name: Membership Plans
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3, or later
extension.description: This module is used to display subscription plans. You can enter 1,3,4,6 or cat-4 or leave the Plan Ids empty to display these plans into article

field.name: layout_type
field.label: Layout
field.description: Choose the layout you want to use to display subscription plans

field.name: plan_ids
field.label: Plan Ids
field.description: Enter Ids of the plans you want to display in the module. Leave it empty to display all plans

field.name: recommended_plan_id
field.label: Recommended Plan ID
field.description: Enter ID of the plan which you want to be recommended. Only works for pricing table layout

field.name: number_columns
field.label: Number Columns
field.description: Only works for columns and pricing table layouts
